Row.Text: The world seems to have declared you its enemy, and is working to destroy your dream. You'll have none of it. By reforming your group as the Diamond Dogs, you will be able to exact your revenge on those who have wronged you.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The MSF [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Denounced by 3/4 of the world's living Civilizations OR must be Embargoed by the World Congress [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Any Mother Base buildings in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital are lost [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Will no longer receive [ICON_MSF_SALVAGE] Salvage or [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Mercenaries in protected City-States or from Conquest [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive {2_Science} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science. This is based on your Science output and your Mother Base level. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Converts your Civilization to [COLOR_PLAYER_DIAMOND_DOGS_BACKGROUND]The Diamond Dogs[ENDCOLOR] and your Leader to [COLOR_PLAYER_DIAMOND_DOGS_ICON]Venom Snake[ENDCOLOR]. This Civilization earns bonuses to all Yields from every kill it makes, but is still incapable of settling or annexing Cities. It has the same Unique Units as The MSF. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital receives a Metal Gear Hangar. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: This Decision is automatically enacted without a Gold or Magistrate cost if you lose your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, but you will not receive the Science bonus if so. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you experience issues with Units or Tiles not updating to your new Civilization's colors and description, these will naturally correct themselves as units Embark/Disembark and cities grow. You may also save and reload after enacting the Decision.
